duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate business processes and anticipate requirements for change.
Lead ongoing reviews of business processes and develop optimization strategies.
Conduct interviews to gather user requirements via various methods.
Prepare business cases and assist in the interpretation of user requirements.
Perform requirements analysis and communicate the results.
Translate business requirements into functional requirements.
Develop and utilize standard templates to write requirement specifications.
Collaborate with stakeholders at all levels and provide leadership and guidance.
Collaborate with ITS teams and business partners to evaluate and prioritize work.
Assist in incident and problem analysis with on-call and after-hours work as necessary.
Assist test analyst(s) with testing duties as necessary.

education_certification.credential: BS or BA with emphasis in computer science, information systems, or business administration (Master's preferred)
Certification of Competency in Business Analysis (CCBA) and/or Certified Business Analysis Professions (CBAP) preferred
